ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Display recent search result items sorting according to table header buttons selected and searched on further based upon filter text input
With(
    {
        recentItems:
            If(
                IsBlank(txtRequisitionRecentlySearchedCommandBarFilter.Text),//Items are not being filtered further
                Filter(
                    'SAP Accelerator Search Histories',
                    'SAP Accelerator Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
                    'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Accelerator Search Histories)'.Requisition//Filter on object type requisition
                ),
                Search(//Search further on history records
                    Filter(
                        'SAP Accelerator Search Histories',
                        'SAP Accelerator Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
                        'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Accelerator Search Histories)'.Requisition//Filter on object type requisition
                    ),
                    txtRequisitionRecentlySearchedCommandBarFilter.Text,//Search on text entered in filter control
                    "mpa_name"
                )
            )
    },
    SortByColumns(
        recentItems,
        Switch(
            varRecentlySearchedSortByColumn,//determine which field to sort by based upon the tabel header column value selected and stored in variable
            btnRequisitionRecentlySearchedTableHeaderRequisition.Text,
            "mpa_name",
            btnRequisitionRecentlySearchedTableHeaderLastSearched.Text,
            "mpa_lastsearchedon"
        ),
        varRecentlySearchedSortOrder//sort ascending or descending based upon value stored in variable
    )
)

!IsEmpty(
    Filter(
        'SAP Accelerator Search Histories',
        'SAP Accelerator Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
        'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Accelerator Search Histories)'.Requisition//Filter on object type requisition
    )
)

Switch(
    true,
    IsBlank(Self.Text),
    false,
    !IsBlank(varNewVendorHeader.Vendor) && Self.Text = varNewVendorHeader.Vendor,
    false,
    true
)

If(
    Or(
        IsEmpty(colRequisitionSearchResults),
        varIsProcessing
    ),
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Display requisition search result items for collection cached
With(
    {
        searchResults: If(
            IsBlank(txtRequisitionSearchResultsFilter.Text),//If additional filter text not entered, then just display results
            colRequisitionSearchResults,
            Search(//Otherwise, search on cached results based upon entered text
                colRequisitionSearchResults,
                txtRequisitionSearchResultsFilter.Text,
                "PurchaseRequisitionNumber",
                "Location",
                "PurchasingGroup",
                "PurchasingOrganization",
                "Vendor","_VendorName"
            )
        )
    },
    SortByColumns(
        searchResults,
        Switch(
            varRequisitionSearchAllSortByColumn,//determine which field to sort by based upon the tabel header column value selected and stored in variable
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderRequisition.Text,
            "PurchaseRequisitionNumber",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderCreatedOn.Text,
            "CreatedOn",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderVendor.Text,
            "Vendor",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderLocation.Text,
            "Location",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderPurchasingOrganization.Text,
            "PurchasingOrganization",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderPurchasingGroup.Text,
            "PurchasingGroup",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderAmount.Text,
            "Amount",
            btnRequisitionSearchResultsTableHeaderVendorName.Text,
            "_VendorName"
        ),
        varRequisitionSearchAllSortOrder//sort ascending or descending based upon value stored in variable
    )
)

Rule.InvariantScript: conRequisitionSearchAllFooter.Height + conRequisitionSearchAllResults.LayoutMinHeight + conRequisitionSearchFields.Height + conRequisitionSearchButtons.Height + Self.PaddingTop + Self.PaddingBottom + Self.LayoutGap * 2 + 10
